ALERT_MAIL_SENT: Thanks {{name}}, your message has been sent.
TAB_SETTING_FORM_CONTACT_ALERT_NAME_REQU: You did not input your name.
TAB_SETTING_FORM_CONTACT_ALERT_NAME_LENG: Your name should be between 3 to 50 letters.
TAB_SETTING_FORM_CONTACT_ALERT_EMAIL_REQ: You did not input your email.
TAB_SETTING_FORM_CONTACT_ALERT_MESSAGE_R: You did not keyin any message.

NOTES_20160107_CONTENT: This APP is finally got ready for public access. In this APP you could survey all products provided by FIMEX. Though we have six language interface, for the mass amount of amount, currently only English version of product information. Sorry for the inconvience.
NOTES_20160108_CONTENT: If you want to share your experience of using this APP or show your interests in FIMEX product, you may send message via CONTACT US form in the SETTING Tab. We will contact you in shortest business days.
NOTES_20160109_CONTENT: Please double click on BACK/EXIT during 2 seconds to exit this app.
